content: a cute crochet chevron headband with loads of texture you ll love this simple pattern you can use over and over to make headbands for your family as gifts or for craft fairs this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy sizes approximately 3″ wide by 20″ around hook size us size i/9 5 5 mm yarn 1 3 oz category 4 medium weight yarn stitches chain single_crochet working in back loop pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern link text 1 1 https //www stitching-together com/gray-skies-chevron-headband/
